app.cards.game

Class HandResultList

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.cards.game.HandResultList

  • public class HandResultList
extends java.lang.Object

    This class maintains a List of HandResults and offers funtionality to rank these results based on their HandValues, including tie detection.

    Newly created HandResults will automatically be ranked inside the list, so subsequent calls asking for the ranking of a specific HandResult will get the correct answer without any extra work.

      • addHand

        public boolean addHand(Hand hand)
        Evaluates a Hand and adds the HandResult to this HandResultList

      • getResultsRankedAt

        public java.util.Collection<HandResult> getResultsRankedAt(int k)
        All HandResults ranked at the supplied position
        Parameters:
        k - the position in the ranking for which to return the HandResults ranked there
        Returns:
        A Collection of HandResults ranked at position k inside this HandResultList. The Collection may contain more than one item in case of a tie.

      • getNumberOfSingleResults

        public int getNumberOfSingleResults()
        The total number of HandResults that have been added to this HandResultList
        Returns:
        The total number of HandResults that have been added to this HandResultList (including the ones added indirectly via addHand(Hand))

      • getNumberOfPlaces

        public int getNumberOfPlaces()

        The number of unique positions in the ranking

        There may be positions containing multiple HandResults in case of a tie, which will only count as one place in terms of this method.

        Returns:
        The number of unique positions in the ranking

      • getPlaceForResultId

        public int getPlaceForResultId(java.lang.String id)
        The position in the ranking for the HandResult with the supplied id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the HandResult for which to look up the position
        Returns:
        The position in the ranking of the HandResult with ID id
        Throws:
        ResultIdNotPresentInResultListException - if a HandResult with ID id could not be found
